{{Talent Infobox
|image         = Talent Pressurized Floe.png
|character     = Freminet
|type          = Elemental Skill
|info          = Performs an upward thrust that deals {{Color|Cryo DMG}} and causes Freminet to enter Pers Timer for 10s.<br>While Pers Timer is active, his Elemental Skill will turn into Shattering Pressure.<br><br>'''Shattering Pressure'''<br>Executes different sorts of attacks based on the Pressure Level of Pers Timer, and then cancels Pers Timer.<br><ul><li>Level 0: Unleashes a vertical cut, dealing {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.</li><li>Levels 1 to 3: Unleashes a vertical cut alongside Pers, dealing {{Color|Cryo DMG}} and {{Color|Physical DMG}}. DMG dealt scales based on Pressure Level.</li><li>Level 4: Borrows the power of a fully-pressurized Pers to deal {{Color|Physical DMG}}. Meanwhile, Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies will be replaced by Shattering Pressure.</li></ul><br>'''Pers Timer'''<br>When Freminet uses Normal Attacks, he will also unleash waves of frost that deal {{Color|Cryo DMG}} and increase Pers's Pressure Level.<br>The accompanying {{Color|Cryo DMG}} dealt this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG.<br><br>'''Arkhe: Pneuma'''<br>At certain intervals, after using the upward thrust, a Spiritbreath Thorn in the form of another upward thrust will be created, dealing [[Pneuma]]-aligned {{Color|Cryo DMG}}.
|CD            = 10s
|utility1      = Physical DMG
|scale_att1    = ATK
|arkhe         = Pneuma
}}
{{Description|To immobilize one's opponent without taking their life can also be considered something of a "survival" strategy that one may choose.<br>"[[Pers]]... I leave the rest to you."}}
'''Pressurized Floe''' is [[Freminet]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When Upward Thrust DMG hits at least one enemy:
** If under the effect of Subnautical Hunter conferred by Freminet's [[Shadowhunter's Ambush|Elemental Burst]], generates 1 [[Elemental Particle]].
** Otherwise, generates 2 Elemental Particles.
* When Level 4 Shattering Pressure DMG hits at least one enemy, generates 1 Elemental Particle.
* The replacement of Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies by Shattering Pressure from obtaining Pressure Level 4 can be reverted by jumping.
:<gallery>
Talent Pressurized Floe 2.png|Level 0–3 Shattering Pressure Icon
Talent Pressurized Floe 3.png|Level 4 Shattering Pressure Icon
</gallery>
